title: A Feeling of self worth
creator_credit: Victoria. Vandalism Task Force and Robin Young
brief_description: A feeling of self worth describes the approach taken at Monterey and the positive impact this has had on the school. Present and former staff and the parents of former students talk about the school as it used to be and the improvements that have been made.
